ModMetaData.name: Industrial Age - Objects and Furniture
ModMetaData.author: Jecrell
ModMetaData.description:
1.19.0.2 (10-01-2018)
Adds new furniture and appliances to your game inspired by the time period of the late 1800's and early 1900s themed after the industrial era.
Adds the following objects: *Refrigerator *Telegraph *Gramophone *Radio *Candelabra *Chandelier *Grand chandelier *Street Gas Lamp *Interior Gas Lamp *Tesla Arc Lamp *Edison Lamp *Edison Tube *Wood Stove Furnace Books and bookcases have been moved to a new mod: RimWriter!
Special thanks to Vendan for a refrigeration subclass. Check out his mod, RimFridge!
Adds the following resources: *Wax (Obtained from meat at cooking tables)
Thank you to my Patrons for supporting me in my efforts. Without you, none of this would be possible.

======================== Changelog ======================== 1.19.0.2 (10-01-2018) ======================== The initial release did not have the proper wax recipe available. Wax can now be properly created at the Electric Stove, Fueled Stove, or Wood Stove by using meat.
1.19.0.1 (09-30-2018) =================== Added many new lightsources. Now uses latest JecsTools code so that most added furniture can be safely placed on top of tables or other surfaces.
